scripts.rules:staging: firebase use staging && echo Compiling... && blaze rules.yaml &> /dev/null && firebase deploy --only database && gulp clean:rules
scripts.rules:production: firebase use production && echo Compiling... && blaze rules.yaml &> /dev/null && firebase deploy --only database && gulp clean:rules
scripts.imports:staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build &> /dev/null && node dist/server/base/data/imports/imports.js && unset NODE_ENV
scripts.imports:production: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build &> /dev/null && node dist/server/base/data/imports/imports.js && unset NODE_ENV
scripts.archive:staging: export NODE_ENV=staging && npm run build &> /dev/null && node dist/server/bin/archive-reviews.js && unset NODE_ENV
scripts.archive:production: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build &> /dev/null && node dist/server/bin/archive-reviews.js && unset NODE_ENV
